name: A Very Dice Game
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

A challenging arcade-style game.

Controls

Use A and D for moving left and right. Use spacebar to throw a card.

Gameplay

For each die that lands on the floor you get the number of points shown on the die. Combos are shown at the bottom left. If you manage to complete the whole combo (in any order), you get all the points of the combo x4. If any die that does not fit the combo lands on the ground, the combo is broken.

Once all 30 dice have landed on the floor, the game is over.

Goal

Achieve a high score by completing the Combos!

Tell us your high score in the comments! :)
